data.prayer: Father, let those from the 21,461 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kota, Rajasthan, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Please, convict the 21,461 believers in Kota, Rajasthan, India to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.section_summary: On average, 158 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Kota, Rajasthan, India.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 1,951,000 citizens of the the county of Kota.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Kota, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, teach the church in the county of Kota to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Father, convict the 21,461 believers in Kota to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Father, we pray that the county of Kota be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.
